candidate_text: The gauntlet has been thrown!

"Pineapple does NOT belong on pizza, and anyone who says otherwise is secretly a robot sent back in time to disrupt the fabric of society.

Here's a hot take for you:

"Pineapple does NOT belong on pizza, a concept I've come to realize after years of blindly following the 'it's-a-matter-of-personal-preference' narrative.
